lines: Perk upgrades are a way to enhance your abilities and skills. As you gain experience and progress in the game, you'll earn tokens.
These tokens can be used to unlock various perks.
You earn tokens by completing quests, defeating enemies, and making progress in the game. The tougher the challenge, the more you'll earn.
To upgrade a perk, you need to spend tokens.
I've got a selection of powerful perks that can give you the edge you need in your journey.
Take a look and let me know what catches your eye.

Welcome, adventurer! Looking to buy some gear to enhance your journey?
Take a look at my wares.
Hey there, adventurer! Looking for something to give you an edge? Or maybe just a new pair of socks?
Check out my inventory, but be warned, my prices are as steep as the mountains around here!
Welcome, adventurer! I've got the best gear in town. And if you believe that, I've got a bridge to sell you too!
Have a look around, just don't break anything. You break it, you buy it!
Wuf!
Grrr... Be careful!
Press X to save game or ESC to close.
Welcome, adventurer! This is your tutorial board. Here you can learn the basics of the game.
Use the %%JUMP%% key to jump.
The %%ATTACK%% key is for attack.
Remember, your journey is filled with challenges. Use your commands wisely.
Good luck on your journey, adventurer!
So, the mortal arrives. Your steps have echoed in the halls of fate for some time.
You seek to challenge me? To unravel what has been woven?
Let's dance!
Hello, handsome! It's so rare to see a new face around here.
Can you help me? A group of RAF bandits has taken over my town and I'm too scared to go out there.
I don't know what to do. I'm so lost.
Can you help me to get rid of them?
If you do, I'll give you a reward. I promise.
Have you done it yet?
Hey, weak creature!
Do you know who I am? I am Nikolas the best fighter in the world.
You will never be strong like me. I'm the best!!!
You know what they say 'If you can't win a fight, it's only your fault' hue-hue-hue.
I train every day to become the best fighter in the world !!!
Hello, young warrior! What brings you to this fire pit?
Be careful, this place is dangerous. I've heard that there are some flying creatures around here.
Drink beer with me and I'll tell you a secret about this place.
Ah, the Warrior of Unwritten Pages. I have been watching the threads of your destiny converge on this very spot.
Do not be startled. The tapestry of fate is an open book to me, and your chapter is stained with... potential.
You carry the weight of choices not yet made, and the echoes of battles yet to be fought.
The threads of fate are ever-shifting. Walk carefully.
I see a crossroads in your future. One path leads to glory, the other... to dust.
Your journey is far from over. The loom of destiny has much more to weave.
